Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can show a string telephone device being used by two students, demonstrating communication over a distance.
The student can illustrate that the device uses sound to communicate between the two people.
The student can draw and label the necessary parts of the string telephone, such as cups and string.
The student can use provided materials in their drawing to show the construction of the device.
The student can include arrows or symbols to show how sound travels along the string.
The student can depict how the device allows communication over a distance, helping people interact without being close.
